price: (37) For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.[1863]
arabic: لِكُلِّ ٱمۡرِيٕٖ مِّنۡهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ شَأۡنٞ يُغۡنِيهِ
footnotes: [1863]- i.e., to occupy him. He will be concerned only with himself, thus forgetting all others.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: likulli im'ri-in min'hum yawma-idhin shanun yugh'nīhi
